亚当·霍罗维茨 Adam Horovitz
凯瑟琳·凯尔纳 Catherine Kellner
克里斯托弗·沃肯 Christopher Walken

this_title: The Work of Director Spike Jonze
introduction: ★ 以《變腦》（Being John Malkovich）榮獲【英國電影金像獎最佳原著劇本】【獨立精神獎最佳首部電影、首部劇本】【紐約影評人協會最佳首部電影、男配角、女配角】【ＭＴＶ電影獎最佳新進導演】【入圍1999年奧斯卡最佳導演、原著劇本、女配角三項大獎 】【入圍1999年金球獎最佳影片、劇本、女配角】...等殊榮之知名導演 Spike Jonze、除了在電影上的成就之外、還身兼MTV音樂錄影帶導演★ Spike於1994年執導過野獸男孩 The Beastie Boy's 的 "Sabotage" 音樂錄影帶，Spike所執導過的音樂錄影帶也曾多次受到 （MTV Video Music Awards）MTV音樂大獎提名。 而 Spike 執導過的流線胖小子單曲 "Praise You" 音樂錄影帶更是MTV音樂錄影帶大獎有史以?碜钍茉u?親睞的ㄧ支音樂錄影帶。 而 Spike 所執導過許多讓人難以忘懷的音樂錄影帶還包括：Weezer樂團的 "Buddy Holly"、Daft Punk傻瓜龐克樂團的 "Da Funk"、冰?u精靈Bjork碧玉的 "It's Oh So Quiet" 及 Fatboy Slim流線胖小子的 "Weapon Of Choice"。★ Spike 也同時與 The Pharcyde、R.E.M.、Notorious B.I.G和The Chemical Brothers化學兄弟...等藝人團體合作過。 這?堄蒔alm Pictures 與 Directors Label共同發行的 MV 導演系列DVD的第一集Spike Jonze中，收錄了數十首Spike歷年?硭鶊虒е浀銶V作品與幕後Documentaries及Spike執導之珍貴短片。DVD 內收錄:Spike Jonze執導 音樂錄影帶:California WAXSure Shot BEASTIE BOYSDrop THE PHARCYDECannonball THE BREEDERSSabotage BEASTIE BOYSDa Funk DAFT PUNKWhat's Up Fatlip? FATLIPUndone (The Sweater Song) WEEZERPraise You FATBOY SLIMFeel The Pain DINOSAUR JR.If I Only Had A Brain MC 900FT JESUSSky's The Limit THE NOTORIOUS B.I.G.Weapon Of Choice FATBOY SLIMBuddy Holly WEEZERElektrobank THE CHEMICAL BROTHERSIt's Oh So Quie BJORK額外珍貴畫面收錄:How They Get There - a short film with Mark Gonzales.Mark Paints - Another short film with Mark Gonzales.The Oasis Video That Never Happened.Rockafella Skank - Richard Koufey's audition tape for Fatboy Slim.The Woods - a short film excerpt from Mouse, a Girl Skateboards film.幕後花絮與Documentaries短片:What's Up Fatlip? (the documentary)- After Fatlip left The Pharcyde, outrageous rumors began circulating. This candid documentary happened as Spike and Fatlip worked together on a music video, and Spike let his curiosity take over. (31 min).Amarillo By Morning- While filming probull riders at a national rodeo in Houston, Spike befriended two suburban teenagers who aspired to be cowboys. This chronicles a day in their life. (29 min).Torrance Rises- Torrance Community Dance Group on the road to their grand performance at the MTV Video Music Awards. (34 min).DVD內附 52 頁彩頁導演手冊:Includes Spike's Photographs, Drawings and Interview.
chinese_title: The Work of Director Spike Jonze
